textBeforeTable: Nutritional Data Nutrition Country of Origin UK Manufacturer Waitrose Limited, Bracknell, Berkshire, RG12 8YA, UK. Package Type Bag - Plastic Recycling Information Bag - Plastic - Not Currently Recycled Other Information Full Product Name: British chicken without giblets Storage: Keep frozen. **** Until 'Best Before' date ***Until 'Best Before' date ** Up to 1 month * Up to 1 week Defrost fully before use: do not refreeze once defrosted. For best before end date see front of pack. Usage: 5-6 Servings Additional Information: Class A Brand Essential Waitrose Storage Keep Frozen Instructions Oven cook - From Chilled. Do not wash poultry before cooking. Gas 6, 200°C, Fan 180°C, 45 mins per kg + 20 mins. For best results roast in the oven. Preheat oven. Remove all packaging. Place in a roasting dish, brush with oil and place in an oven until thoroughly cooked, the juices run clear and there is no pink meat. If the breast browns too quickly cover with foil. Stand for 10 minutes before carving. Do not reheat once cooled. Preparation and Usage Preparation: Wash hands, all surfaces and utensils after touching raw poultry. Return To Address We are committed to bringing you the best quality. Should you not be happy with this product, please bring the packaging back to any Waitrose branch and we'll replace your item and refund you.
